content: Can T-infra set up forwarding from #rustdoc on Discord to a discord topic in #rustdoc on Zulip?
Not at this time, I don't think.

@camelid The normal procedure has been to create a corresponding Zulip channel, then make a pinned post on the Discord channel pointing to Zulip, then lock the Discord channel. Several channels have migrated that way, and it works as a forwarding link so that people who find the Discord channel can find the corresponding Zulip channel.
